original_text: But Samuel was ministering before the Lord—a boy wearing a linen ephod.
korean_text: 사무엘은 어렸을 때에 세마포 에봇을 입고 여호와 앞에서 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: But Samuel was ministering before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사무엘은 주님 앞에서 섬기고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: a boy wearing a linen ephod
